title: Response to globalization by govt., cit. in Mexico

content.question: Globalization has both political and economic consequences. Define economic globalization. Describe one policy response of the Mexican government to economic globalization. Describe one organized response of Mexican citizens to economic globalization.

frqParts.text: Globalization has both political and economic consequences. Define economic globalization. Describe one policy response of the Mexican government to economic globalization. Describe one organized response of Mexican citizens to economic globalization.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.2: Political Responses to Global Market Forces

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
